summary: Feature request to rename the 'codec' configuration option to 'codecs' in the TypeScript SDK for consistency and clarity.
userImpact: Users would benefit from more intuitive naming that better reflects that multiple codecs can be used.
proposedFix: Rename the 'codec' property to 'codecs' in the SDK configuration.
resolutionDetails: The codec configuration was renamed to codecs to better represent multiple codec support.
